Name: minimize_total_project_duration
Description: Minimize the overall calendar time from project start to end.

Name: maximize_team_utilization
Description: Maximize the average percentage of time team members are working on tasks.

Name: minimize_total_development_cost
Description: Minimize the total cost based on worker time and fixed budgets.

Name: maximize_feature_delivery
Description: Maximize the number of high-priority features delivered.

Name: minimize_context_switching
Description: Minimize the number of different tasks a worker is assigned to within a sprint.

Name: maximize_skill_task_match
Description: Maximize the alignment between tasks and the skills of the workers assigned to them.

Name: minimize_blocker_impact
Description: Minimize the total severity and duration of blockers.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the rate of successfully achieved sprint goals.

Name: minimize_technical_debt
Description: Minimize the effort estimated for tasks marked as technical debt.

Name: balance_team_workload
Description: Minimize the variance in assigned story points across all team members.
